ReticleMode.title: Reticle Mode
ReticleMode.tooltip: Changes whether the dot in the center of the screen is visible. When set to Contextual, the reticle will only appear when using the scout launcher or translator tool. Gameplay impact: None.

DisableAutoScoutEquip.title: Disable Automatic Scout Equipping
DisableAutoScoutEquip.tooltip: Disables scout being automatically equipped in certain areas. Gameplay impact: Very little.

DisableFreezeTime.title: Don't Freeze Time at a Certain End-Game Location
DisableFreezeTime.tooltip: Disables the freezing of time in a location where it doesn't matter. Gameplay impact: None.

EquipTranslator.title: Equip Translator with T
EquipTranslator.tooltip: Allows you to equip the translator whenever you want by pressing T. Gameplay impact: None.

EyesAlwaysGlow.title: Eyes Always Glow
EyesAlwaysGlow.tooltip: Makes a certain type of eye always glow. Gameplay impact: Makes certain sections a bit easier.

ExitDialogue.title: Press 'Cancel' Button to Exit Dialogue
ExitDialogue.tooltip: Makes dialogue boxes from speaking to characters or reading notes disappear immediately if the cancel button is pressed. Gameplay impact: Functionally none, but can cause new players to miss information.
